head.citation-title: 1st International Conference of Artificial Intelligence, Medical Engineering, and Education, AIMEE 2017
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 32 papers. The special focus in this conference is on Artificial Intelligence, Medical Engineering, and Education. The topics include: The genetic coding, united-hypercomplex numbers and artificial intelligence; exploring structure and evolution of the genetic code with the software tool GCAT; matrix representations of genetic codes and human emotions; matrices in improvement of systems of artificial intelligence and education of specialists; a mathematical proof of double helix DNA to reverse transcription RNA for bioinformatics; tests of parallel information processing on the basis of algebra and formal automata; control strategy of energy storage for frequency coordination dispatch based on improved niche genetic algorithm; architecture and method of integrating information and knowledge on the basis of the ontological structure; a novel approach to estimating databases maximum updating time; modeling the operation of an adaptive computing system based on FGPN for case risk management; evaluation of library information cloud nodes configuration scheme based on DEA method; anthropometrical model in pentacanon; intelligent internet technology for personalized health-saving support; intelligence self-propelled planar parallel robot for sliding cupping-glass massage for back and chest; art of recognition the electromyographic signals for control of the bionic artificial limb of the hand; intelligent recognition of electrocardiograms using selective neuron networks and deep learning; virtual concilium for diagnostics of heterogeneous diseases and artificial intelligence as tutoring partner for human intellect.

translated-sourcetitle.$: Advances in Intelligent Systems and Computing

confevent.confname: 1st International Conference of Artificial Intelligence, Medical Engineering, and Education, AIMEE 2017
confevent.confseriestitle: International Conference of Artificial Intelligence, Medical Engineering, and Education

source.sourcetitle: Advances in Intelligent Systems and Computing
source.issuetitle: Advances in Artificial Systems for Medicine and Education
